mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fire-Place and Secretary in Washington's Bed-Room.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Johnson, N. G. (Newton G.)
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: N. G. Johnson, Photographer, 309 9th St., Washington, D. C. Only authorized Publisher of Mt. Vernon Views.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of the northwest corner of Washington's Chamber which includes a secretary bookcase and desk, fireplace and fireback, a rug and other furnishings. Label on the reverse reads: The Fireplace in Washington's Bed room where he died and the old Mahogany Secretary used by him.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Washington's chamber
